H0.text: Who was Chancellor of the Exchequer in Clement Atlee's government from 1947 to 1950. Hugh Dalton

H1.text: Who was Chancellor of the Exchequer in Clement Atlee's government from 1947 to 1950. Ernest Bevin

H2.text: Who was Chancellor of the Exchequer in Clement Atlee's government from 1947 to 1950. Herbert Morrison

H3.text: Who was Chancellor of the Exchequer in Clement Atlee's government from 1947 to 1950. STAFFORDCRIPPS

A4.text: Another balance of payments crisis in 1949 forced Chancellor of the Exchequer, Stafford Cripps, into devaluation of the pound.
